name: A Quick Guide to Character Pages
name_original: A Quick Guide to Character Pages
description:
This is a Twine tutorial/template (specifically for the Sugarcube format) which I quickly threw together. Download the template and load it into Twine then check out the PDF for instructions on how it works. Feel free to check out how the template looks by playing through it here in the browser. 

Features of this template include:

  • Examples of a profile page and character pages with stat bars
  • Example of a codex with a lore entry
  • Code for setting player name and setting player pronouns (including custom pronouns)
  • Basic character creation choice
  • Examples of how to present player choices and how to make choices affect statistics
  • Code for changing the font size and switching the text to the OpenDyslexic font
  • List of resources for making twine games/interactive fiction
  • A very short silly story

    • If you have any questions feel free to reach out to me here!
